item.title: Course Resources
item.description: In addition to the Syllabus and the Reading List, there are a number of other course resources you should be aware of. Course Website This course website will be updated regularly throughout the semester. I’ll add a page on the menu for each week, and include links to lecture slides, YouTube videos, and notes about specific topics. Books Throughout the semester, there will be assigned readings from a number of different books.
